name: DotNetAuthenticate
description: Configures NuGet package management in dotnet to authenticate with Azure Artifacts and other repositories. Requires .NET Core SDK 2.1.400 or higher.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: nuGetServiceConnections
inputs.label: Service connection credentials for feeds outside this organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service connection credentials for feeds outside this organization/collection. For feeds in this organization/collection, leave this blank; the buildâ€™s credentials are used automatically.

messages.ConfiguringDotnetForCredProvider: Configuring dotnet to use the credential provider. For more information, see https://aka.ms/DotnetAuthenticateTask
